message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm asking for $1,100,000. I believe this reflects a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your operations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but $950,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This is my final offer, as I have other interested parties.
I appreciate your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $1,000,000. I hope this aligns better with the value you're seeking for the product.
